title: Roxy Jacenko comforts Hunter in hospital while dressed as RuPaul
text:
Roxy Jacenko's family has always been her first priority.

And this was particularly evident last Friday, when the Sydney PR queen rushed to a Sydney hospital to comfort son Hunter, four, while on a job for Stan Australia.

Taking to Instagram on Monday, the 39-year-old said she 'gave the nurses a good laugh' when she arrived at the ward dressed as American drag queen RuPaul.

Dressed in drag: Roxy Jacenko, 39, recalled comforting son Hunter, four, at a Sydney hospital on Friday, while dressed as American drag queen RuPaul

Roxy had been out and about promoting the latest season of RuPaul's Drag Race which airs on Stan Australia, when she dropped everything to be with her son.

Explaining the incident on Instagram, she said: 'This was me. Last Friday for the most part of the day.

'Full drag for @stanaustralia and @rupaulsdragrace, two wigs made into one, a pleather frock and a pair of black Nike's unlaced [as there was simply no time to do them up] in the Children's ER with @huntercurtis14.'

Roxy added: 'Flicking through my phone just now to come across it and think woweeee life is a roller coaster!!!

Family first: Taking to Instagram on Monday, Roxy explained how she was on a job for Stan Australia to promote RuPaul's Drag Race, when she rushed to be by Hunter's side

'All is well now and at least I gave the team of nursing staff a good laugh. They weren't quite sure to make of the whole situation.'

In the photo, Roxy was dressed in a pink pleather frock, and two blonde wigs were joined together and piled up high on top of her head.

Accessories included hoop earrings, and her makeup look included heavy kohl liner, extra thick false lashes, contoured cheekbones and a pink lip.

Family-of-four: The bestselling author shares Hunter and son Pixie, eight, with husband Oliver Curtis

The Sweaty Betty PR founder told her followers that Hunter is now on the mend.

Roxy shares Hunter and daughter Pixie, eight, with husband Oliver Curtis.

Pixie is already a social media star with 97,200 followers on her Instagram account.

In a 2017 interview with 9Honey, Roxy admitted that people are often critical of how she is raising Pixie and Hunter.

Rising star: Pixie is already a social media star with 97,200 followers on her Instagram account

'So many people give their advice on what I should be doing differently,' she said.

'I've learned there is no set way to parent. You need to parent according to that particular child.'

Roxy also revealed she's all too happy to put mum-shaming Instagram trolls in their place.

'I write back. I can't help myself,' the bestselling author confessed.
description: Roxy Jacenko's family has always been her first priority.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
